articles.title: Ryder Cup: US extend lead over Europe to 9-3 at Whistling Straits, Wisconsin - BBC Sport
articles.description: Europe's hopes of retaining the Ryder Cup suffer a further blow as they lose Saturday's foursomes 3-1 to trail the United States 9-3 in Wisconsin.
articles.content:
Garcia and Rahm again provided the sole point for Europe in the foursomes

articles.title: Morrison in defence mode as AUKUS fallout goes global - Sydney Morning Herald
articles.description: Frozen out in Europe, feted in Washington, alarming some of its south-east Asian neighbours: the AUKUS misfire raises questions about Australia’s ability to perform on the world stage.
